result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Pretrial Services Violation Report With CT's Response- No change but monitor

2:31 PM Defendant Stephen J McCauley in court.  Attorney Darrin Crawford in court for Stephen J McCauley.  Attorney Robin W Lee in court for State of Wisconsin.  Offer given. Set for STC and Scheduling in about a month. Any motion should be brought prior to next hearing. 
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Pretrial Services Violation Report With CT's Response- No change but monitor
Setover Request- Atty Wood
Motion and Demand for Discovery and Notice of DNA and Witness List- State of Wisconsin
Status conference on September 30, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Information was E-filed with the court and a copy was given to the defendant; Defendant waived reading of Information; Defendant stood mute, Court enters plea of Not Guilty; motions due in 20 days; bail continued.

State calls Dane County Sheriff's Office Deputy, C. Woods, sworn. Direct. Cross. Deputy released.  State moves for bind over, waives argument, saves for rebuttal.  Atty. Crawford objects, and argues.  Rebuttal by State. CT: finds probable cause and does bind over.
and returned.
Email correspondence from Clerk to Atty's re: bail modification

The Court ordered a signature bond on the condition that the defendant reports to and complies with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report by (date) 7/8/22 at 2:45pm. The following checked category(s) are also ordered: __ GPS, _X_ Remote Breath (Alcohol) Monitoring, and/or __ Random Drug Testing.
- Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. 
- Defendant shall not consume or possess alcohol.  
NONCOMPLIANCE WILL BE REPORTED BY DCPS TO THE JUDICIARY WHO SHALL RESPOND IN ONE OF THESE WAYS: Schedule bail hearing, Increase Supervision, Issue warrant, No change but monitor.
Referral to Dane County Pretrial Services
Preliminary hearing on August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

At the agreement of parties the Court amends Defendant's bail conditions as follows:  Defendant to participate in Dane County Pretrial Services and Remote Breath Monitoring.   Condtiion of "not to drive a motor vehicle" is amended to 
 -No driving without a valid drivers license.

All other conditions remain as previously set.

02:23 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Erin Nagy.  Benjamin Wagner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
